tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.28
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_FLOW $output_data_FLOW output_data_UPAREA $output_data_UPAREA name SAGA.ta_hydrology.28 ELEVATION $ELEVATION FIELDS $FIELDS STOP $STOP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.outputType_FLOW transmissionMode_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.transmissionMode_FLOW outputType_UPAREA $OutputSection_UPAREA.outputType_UPAREA transmissionMode_UPAREA $OutputSection_UPAREA.transmissionMode_UPAREA

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: FIELDS
param.help: FIELDS The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff

param.name: STOP
param.label: Stop at edge
param.help: Stop flow at the edge of a field

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FLOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FLOW
param.label: Flow table
param.help: Table containing the flow from and to each field

section.name: OutputSection_UPAREA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
